episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Community Tech & Governance
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Community Tech & Governance.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [GN AI ML Infrastructure] Cisco bets partner dependency will help it win AI infrastructure race and [GN AI ML Infrastructure] Google issues 100-year bonds to fund AI infrastructure race, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into community tech & governance, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
